product_description: Norjews Baby Safety Magnetic Cabinet Locks Discovering new things are children's nature, it's a good thing. However, danger is everywhere. Parents have to keep constant eyes on their children. Now Norjews's magnetic locks could do you a favor for protecting your children. Effective Child Proofing Locks Not like the traditional locks, these magnetic locks are not only effective but also not an eyesore. Kids couldn't notice the locks from the outside, and without the keys, they're not able to open drawers and cabinets. No Damage on Furniture Easy installation, no other tools needed. And do not damage your furniture. Notes: 1. Doors, cabinets and drawers which are thicker than 1.2'' or with metal are NOT RECOMMENDED ! 2. Please clean up and dry the surface before installation. 3. Before installing the lock, make sure it's aligned with the latch. 4. Please wait for 24 hours before usage, and the adhesive tape will be firmer. 5. Please put the keys out of kids' sight. Two Reusable Locators Are Provided Mechanism system includes only the Lock and the Catch. Locator is NOT the part of mechanism system, the only function is to line up the Lock and the Catch when in installation, so it has to be removed once the Lock and the Catch is installed. Otherwise, mechanism system will not work. Package Lists: 1 x Instruction Manual (with installation video) 2 x Installation Locators 3 x Magnetic Keys 20 x Locks 20 x Catches 40 x Small Stickers (20 black, 20 white) 40 x Screws (an option) 10 x Spare Lock Adhesives (42*18mm) 10 x Spare Catch Adhesives (35*31mm)
